author: kalgiz
body:
Travis CI daily build fails for macOS with message: "'Add-AppveyorCompilationMessage' is not recognized as the name of a cmdlet, function, script file, or operable program."

See: https://travis-ci.org/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/347145271

The reason seems to be PR: #6111
title: Travis CI daily build fails for macOS
